name: Temur Roar (Tarkir Dragonstorm Commander Precon Decklist)

main.name: Eshki, Temur's Roar
main.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Eshki. If that spell's power is 4 or greater, draw a card. If that spell's power is 6 or greater, Eshki deals damage equal to Eshki's power to each opponent.

card.name: Ureni of the Unwritten
card.oracle_text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Ureni enters or attacks, look at the top eight cards of your library. You may put a Dragon creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Ureni of the Unwritten
card.oracle_text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Ureni enters or attacks, look at the top eight cards of your library. You may put a Dragon creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Command Tower
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text: Safe havens amid the desert and dragonstorms, Abzan fortresses attract merchants, travelers, outcasts, and exiles.

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text: Sometimes restoring the lost archives of the Jeskai can be as simple as the quiet ruffle of pages and the smell of fresh ink.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
card.flavor_text: Mardu lightning fences are the ingenious synthesis of blacksmith skill and stormsinger magic, protecting their dalkovans from even the most fearsome dragonstorms.

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."
—Pulan, Bant orchardist

card.name: Fellwar Stone
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
—Mairsil, the Pretender

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: The boiling seas around Shiv provided a welcome layer of protection for the reclaimed Mana Rig.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text: Dragonstorm chasers are not deterred by danger—they claim there is nothing like witnessing the land embracing the power of a storm.

card.name: Sulfur Falls
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
card.flavor_text:
"We have inherited the mysteries of the Thran, but few of the answers."
—Jhoira

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Frontier Bivouac
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R}.
card.flavor_text: With a warm fire and a fresh catch, Temur hunters find respite in even the coldest climates.

card_faces.name: Whirlwing Stormbrood
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
You may cast sorcery spells and Dragon spells as though they had flash.

card_faces.name: Dynamic Soar
card_faces.oracle_text: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. (Then shuffle this card into its owner's library.)

card.name: Hinterland Harbor
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
card.flavor_text:
"Our ancestors brought down a Phyrexian portal ship, then built our town on its hull. We're pretty proud of that."
—Alene of Riverspan

card.name: Farseek
card.oracle_text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

card.name: Breaching Dragonstorm
card.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if that spell's mana value is 8 or less. If you don't, put that card into your hand.
When a Dragon you control enters, return this enchantment to its owner's hand.

card_faces.name: Stormshriek Feral
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
{1}{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card_faces.name: Flush Out
card_faces.oracle_text: Discard a card. If you do, draw two cards. (Then shuffle this card into its owner's library.)

card.name: Encroaching Dragonstorm
card.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
When a Dragon you control enters, return this enchantment to its owner's hand.

card.name: Deceptive Frostkite
card.oracle_text:
Flying
You may have this creature enter as a copy of a creature you control with power 4 or greater, except it's a Dragon in addition to its other types and it has flying.
card.flavor_text:
"That's not a dragon. Can't be. It's too small, isn't it?"
—Askar, Temur scout, last words

card.name: Will of the Temur
card.oracle_text:
Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both instead.
• Create a token that's a copy of target permanent, except it's a 4/4 Dragon creature with flying in addition to its other types.
• Target player draws cards equal to the greatest mana value among permanents you control.

card.name: Hammerhead Tyrant
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell, return up to one target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value less than or equal to that spell's mana value to its owner's hand.
card.flavor_text: Without subjects, but a tyrant nonetheless.

card.name: Reality Shift
card.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

card.name: Rapid Hybridization
card.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.
card.flavor_text:
"From the day we are born, we do our best to survive. We fight. We run. We fear. But we cannot protect ourselves from change."
—Ark, lizardfolk blacksmith

card.name: Draconic Lore
card.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Dragon.
Draw three cards.
card.flavor_text: The wyrmling studied the ancient carvings and dreamed of a day when her own exploits would be immortalized in stone.

card.name: Keiga, the Tide Star
card.oracle_text:
Flying
When Keiga dies, gain control of target creature.
card.flavor_text: The pull of the tide star holds eternal sway.

card.name: Parapet Thrasher
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever one or more Dragons you control deal combat damage to an opponent, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn —
• Destroy target artifact that opponent controls.
• This creature deals 4 damage to each other opponent.
• Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Zenith Festival
card.oracle_text:
Exile the top X cards of your library. You may play them until the end of your next turn.
Harmonize {X}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its harmonize cost. You may tap a creature you control to reduce that cost by an amount of generic mana equal to its power. Then exile this spell.)

card.name: Thundermane Dragon
card.oracle_text:
Flying
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast creature spells with power 4 or greater from the top of your library. If you cast a creature spell this way, it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Reflections of Littjara
card.oracle_text:
As this enchantment enters, choose a creature type.
Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, copy that spell. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
card.flavor_text: The masks float downstream toward the Mirrorlake, where faces arise to wear them.

card.name: Dragon Tempest
card.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature you control with flying enters, it gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a Dragon you control enters, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

card.name: Dragonlord's Servant
card.oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
card.flavor_text: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

card.name: Gadrak, the Crown-Scourge
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Gadrak can't attack unless you control four or more artifacts.
At the beginning of your end step, create a Treasure token for each nontoken creature that died this turn. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Chaos Warp
card.oracle_text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blasphemous Act
card.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
card.flavor_text: In the early days of Valley, desperate animalfolk harnessed the power of Calamity Beasts in ways that destroyed more than defended.

card.name: Nogi, Draco-Zealot
card.oracle_text:
Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever Nogi attacks, if you control three or more Dragons, until end of turn, Nogi becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 5/5 and gains flying.
card.flavor_text: "Glory to the Burning Ones! May their mighty fangs devour all foes!"

card.name: Glorybringer
card.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
You may exert this creature as it attacks. When you do, it deals 4 damage to target non-Dragon creature an opponent controls. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
card.flavor_text: What the initiates face in the final trial is completely at Hazoret's discretion.

card.name: Broodcaller Scourge
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever one or more Dragons you control deal combat damage to a player, you may put a permanent card with mana value less than or equal to that damage from your hand onto the battlefield.
card.flavor_text: Younger dragons bow to its will, not out of respect, but out of fear.

card.name: Lathliss, Dragon Queen
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another nontoken Dragon you control enters, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
{1}{R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Become the Avalanche
card.oracle_text: Draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. Then creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
card.flavor_text:
"You had your warning. Now you get us."
—Eshki Dragonclaw

card.name: Frontier Siege
card.oracle_text:
As this enchantment enters, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G}.
• Dragons — Whenever a creature you control with flying enters, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

card.name: Hellkite Courser
card.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, you may put a commander you own from the command zone onto the battlefield. It gains haste. Return it to the command zone at the beginning of the next end step.
card.flavor_text: The charge was heralded not by horns, but by the dragon's echoing roar.

card.name: Leyline Tyrant
card.oracle_text:
Flying
You don't lose unspent red mana as steps and phases end.
When this creature dies, you may pay any amount of {R}. When you do, it deals that much damage to any target.

card.oracle_text:
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Kodama's Reach
card.oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Beast Within
card.oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
card.flavor_text: Beasties tend to be shy, kind to humans, and absolutely ruthless toward Valgavoth's monstrous spawn.

card.name: Nesting Dragon
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a 0/2 red Dragon Egg creature token with defender and "When this token dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and '{R}: This token gets +1/+0 until end of turn.'"

card.name: Haven of the Spirit Dragon
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Dragon creature spell.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Return target Dragon creature card or Ugin planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Elemental Bond
card.oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control with power 3 or greater enters, draw a card.
card.flavor_text:
"I want to help Zendikar. Show me the way."
—Nissa Revane

card.name: Rapacious Dragon

Flying

card.name: Stormbreath Dragon

{5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Sarkhan, Soul Aflame
card.oracle_text:
Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever a Dragon you control enters, you may have Sarkhan become a copy of it until end of turn, except its name is Sarkhan, Soul Aflame and it's legendary in addition to its other types.

card.name: Atarka, World Render
card.oracle_text:
Flying, trample
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn.
card.flavor_text:
"Her hunger knows no limit. Left unchecked, she would feast on all of Tarkir."
—Yasova Dragonclaw

card.name: Dragonmaster Outcast
card.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
card.flavor_text: "This world will be ruled by its rightful sovereigns, not these hideous pretenders."

card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
card.flavor_text: On the volcanic continent of Akoum, bizarre vegetation clusters around gas vents, and jagged mountain peaks rise high into the air.

card.oracle_text:
Creatures you control have haste.

card.oracle_text:
Flying, haste

card.oracle_text:
Flying

card.oracle_text:
Flying
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever this creature attacks for the first time each turn, if it's attacking the player with the most life or tied for most life, untap all attacking creatures. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
